程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.cql

类 CQLStoreManager

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.common.AbstractStoreManager
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.common.DistributedStoreManager
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.cql.CQLStoreManager
所有已实现的接口:
KeyColumnValueStoreManager, StoreManager
public class CQLStoreManager
extends DistributedStoreManager
implements KeyColumnValueStoreManager
This class creates see CQLKeyColumnValueStores and handles Cassandra-backed allocation of vertex IDs for JanusGraph (when so configured).

  • 嵌套类概要

    从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.common.DistributedStoreManager

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CQLStoreManager

      public CQLStoreManager​(Configuration configuration) throws BackendException
      Constructor for the CQLStoreManager given a JanusGraph Configuration.
      参数:
      configuration - Graph configuration
      抛出:
      BackendException - throws PermanentBackendException in case CQL connection cannot be initialized or CQLStoreManager cannot be initialized

    • CQLStoreManager

      public CQLStoreManager​(Configuration configuration, CQLMutateManyFunctionBuilder mutateManyFunctionBuilder, CQLStoreFeaturesBuilder storeFeaturesBuilder, CQLSessionBuilder sessionBuilder, CQLProgrammaticConfigurationLoaderBuilder baseConfigurationLoaderBuilder) throws BackendException
      Constructor for the CQLStoreManager given a JanusGraph Configuration.
      参数:
      configuration - Graph configuration
      mutateManyFunctionBuilder - Builder for mutate many function with or without executor service
      storeFeaturesBuilder - Builder for store features function with DistributedStoreManager.Deployment
      sessionBuilder - Builder for CqlSession
      baseConfigurationLoaderBuilder - Builder for CqlSession main configuration. It's not guaranteed to be used if it's disabled or if other configuration types are provided with higher priority.
      抛出:
      BackendException - throws PermanentBackendException in case CQL connection cannot be initialized or CQLStoreManager cannot be initialized
